snippet.title: Recompile - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/986310/Recompile/

Phigames and Dear Villagers are glad to reveal Recompile's first trailer! Our atmospheric hacking adventure game Recompile will be coming to PC in 2020.

Combining traditional Metroidvania mechanics with a dynamic branching narrative system, Recompile challenges players to explore, fight, hack and survive. Discover the many secrets beneath the ancient digital landscape, and prepare for system-wide reconfiguration.

#RecompileGame #PrepareForSystemReconfiguration

More news about the game on social media:
https://twitter.com/phi6

Dear Villagers:
https://twitter.com/DearVillagers
https://www.facebook.com/DearVillagers/
